- PRO's Iceland example stands largely unrefuted beyond speculation about replicability

- PRO wins on evidence (controlled study vs. misapplied study)
- PRO wins on clash (directly refutes key arguments)
- PRO wins on weighing (clear comparative analysis)
- Arguments roughly equal in quality, slight edge to PRO for structure
